details.callToWorship: Brethren, We Have Met to Worship #379
details.song: Bless the Lord, O My Soul
details.songOfAdoration: I Stand Amazed in the Presence #547
details.songOfResponse: Before the Throne of God Above

list: We will share details about the church picnic, to be held at the Deaton’s farm, as soon as possible.

MBC will host the CRMA Fall Retreat October 10-11. Men, you can register at thecrma.com/events. If you are willing to host one or more of the CRMA organizers or speakers in your home for two nights, please let Ryan know.
